solution_line_template: He dances for {dance_session_duration}*{dance_sessions_per_day}=<<{dance_session_duration}*{dance_sessions_per_day}={dance_hours_per_day}>>{dance_hours_per_day} hour per day
So he burns {dance_calories_per_hour}*{dance_hours_per_day}=<<{dance_calories_per_hour}={calories_per_day}>>{calories_per_day} calories per day
So he burns {dance_calories_per_hour}*{dance_days_per_week}=<<{dance_calories_per_hour}*{dance_days_per_week}={calories_per_week}>>{calories_per_week} calories per week
